Author: IkarosFalling
Text: Take probiotics at the least, they have pills so if you can't stomach food try to get those. It'll repair some of the damage from the antibiotics because you don't need irritable bowel on top of all this!  If you can, try to eat or drink something with active culture like yogurt. The more you are able to feed up now and fight the infection, the sooner you'll be back to yourself and free to do as you choose! You need your vitamins and electrolytes a lot right now especially if you're not eating much!
